description.originalText: Bridget worked as a nanny for our 3 children for over 3 years. When she first started, the kids were 2, 6, and 8 and they were 5, 9, and 11 when the job ended because my youngest went to kindergarten.  During those 3 years, we got to know Bridget very well.  She is reliable, creative, self-motivated, and calm and level headed no matter what my 3 kiddos threw her way.  My kids are very involved in sports and other activities and she managed pick ups, drop offs, hair buns for dance, make up for recitals, and countless runs to soccer practice.  We were initially on the fence about hiring a nanny, but hiring Bridget was one of the best decisions we made for our kids!

description.displayText: Bridget has spent the last two years working for our family part-time caring for our young children. Bridget always arrived on time, prepared, and ready to work. As the kids got older, Bridget enjoyed safely taking our children on trips to the zoo, Stan Hywet, and to local playgrounds. Bridget and I had a trusting relationship and I considered her a member of our family. She is compassionate and calm. We managed childcare, discipline, and challenges that came as a team together. Bridget helped take our daughter to and from preschool. She helped with light housework and our dog. She also adhered to our kids' schedule, daily routine, and helped potty train both children. Due to the circumstances of the current pandemic and COVID-19, our family was not in the need of additional childcare. Any local family would be lucky to have Bridget care for their children and we will miss her!

description.displayText: We only used Bridget for a little less than half a year (we moved to FL so we could be closer to my wife's side of the family) but we would have held on to her much longer if we had stayed! Our girls always looked forward to their time with her and she was always dependable and handled our dynamic schedule very well!

description.displayText: Bridget is wonderful! Our girls love her. We have a 2 and 3 year old. She's always thinking of fun things to do with them. She even walks our dog. She's punctual and stays late if we need her to. We are moving out of state, or we'd keep her!
description.originalText: Bridget is wonderful! Our girls love her. We have a 2 and 3 year old. She's always thinking of fun things to do with them. She even walks our dog. She's punctual and stays late if we need her to. We are moving out of state, or we'd keep her!

description.displayText: Bridget is my friend but she has also been a babysitter for my youngest son. Bridget is a mature ,responsible ,energetic and kind young woman. She is honest and trustworthy and I have complete faith in her caring for my son. She has a love for children and is naturally drawn to them. And the best part is that children are naturally drawn to her. I consider it an honor to be a reference for her.
